name: Fischer Esterification
scope: Carboxylic acids with alcohols in acidic conditions. Equilibrium reaction that can be driven by removal of water or excess alcohol.
limitations: Equilibrium reaction, requires acid catalyst. Water removal often needed for high yields. Some acids may decarboxylate under conditions.

examples.description: Acetic acid + methanol to methyl acetate
Benzoic acid + methanol to methyl benzoate
